$2,000 to press vinyl
$500 to ship the LPs

If you’ve already contributed and chosen a perk that includes a physical CD, keep an eye out for an email from me very soon with info about how to upgrade your perk to vinyl!
For everyone else, there are two new vinyl related perks for you to choose from: The Vinyl Vixen and The Vinyl Bundle! Check em out!
I am just absolutely overflowing with gratitude. Thank you all so much for helping me make this happen. Anything that happens from here on out is just icing on an already magnificent cake.
With all my love and gratitude,Mally- - - - - - - - - -
ABOUT THE PROJECT
I recorded the album in February 2020 with the help of Evan Hamilton and Mike McKenzie. Holed up in a wee flat outside Edinburgh, Scotland, the three of us dove deep into the music, arranging and producing each song as we went. The process was intuitive, collaborative and organic – full of missteps, laughter, happy accidents, and moments of pure brilliance. I am so proud of what we captured during those six days.  
Now, a year later, I am in the throes of creativity - collaborating with photographers, artists, videographers, and sound engineers to bring the music and art of free to life. I cannot wait to share it all with you!
But I need your help to make it happen!
What your contributions mean…
Making an album is an incredibly expensive endeavor – it takes time, courage, faith and a pretty big chunk of change. By contributing to my campaign, you’ll be helping me to pay for:

Musician fees
Recording & production expenses
Artwork & photography
Music videos
Marketing & promotion
Printing the album
Merchandise

If we surpass our goal of $6,500, I may even be able to print vinyl (a lifelong dream)!! There are lots of great perks to choose from, or you can simply donate.
I know from past experience that it takes a village to bring a project like this to life, so I hope you will consider donating and being a part of my village!

story:
The Music 

I'm recording my first album, Worthy♥

Imagine that Bluegrass and New Age music made a baby.  The result would be my self-proclaimed genre of music, “Medicine Grass”.  

I would love your support so that I can offer my musical medicine to all who may benefit from receiving it!

I write original heart songs that are prayers for deep healing and transformation. Each song is intended to honor our Infinite worth, and to help teach every child and adult that who you are at the core is good and that the world needs YOU.

People often share with me that after hearing my music, they feel a yearning to listen to my songs in moments of self-doubt and self confidence. The lyrics contain positive affirmations that slip into their subconscious over time, gradually replacing intrusive rumination and unproductive worries with powerful new life affirming thought patterns.  You can listen to one of the songs, Birthright, in the video above.

If you are familiar with my music, this is the track listing (subject to change during the creative process, of course!) 

1. Nuestra Canción
2. Infinite Divinity
3. Wings
4. Worthy/Ode to EFT
5. Heart of My Soul
6. Hijo
7. Life Lover
8. You Yes You/Wedding Song
9. Birthright

I have an epic team behind me. To create my album I'm joining forces with producer Nat Keefe. He has worked with many artists in the bluegrass genre including  Bonnie Pain (of Elephant Revival), Fruition, and his own band Hot Buttered Rum. Nat will also be playing music on the album itself! We have chosen Tiny Telephone Studios, in San Francisco, to be the chrysalis from which this album emerges.  

 I am so honored to have my Husband Jeffrey Honeyheart,  Philip Brezina of the Brother’s Comatose, and Robert James Ryan III of All Else Is, blessing the album with their genius artistry.  I will be recording nine original songs in an uplifting and fun style that allows their healing power to shine through♥

 

What I Need & What You Get

A project like this requires a lot of time, energy and funds ★

I am raising money to cover the main expenses, which are the studio time, the producer, my band, and the post production. 

If this campaign is successfully funded, I'll be able to spend the ideal amount of time in the studio to record and capture the vision I have for this album.

I've created some unique perks here for you to make sure that you're splendidly rewarded for your contribution! 

★★★ You are also welcome to simply donate ★★★

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 Any way that you can show your support would mean so much to me ❤

Please Help Spread the word by: 

★Post this campaign on your Facebook page

★Share this campaign with someone who loves bluegrass, and healing music (like Jerry Garcia & David Grisman,  Elephant Revival, The Brother’s Comatose, Rising Appalachia, Ayla Nereo, Ali Maya, Tara Divina, Mary Isis, and Annie May Willis).

Deepest Love and Gratitude,

Pia Luz Honeyheart

story:
Recorded in Isolation. 

We came together in 2020 and recorded dozens of songs. Isolated in our own home recording rooms, we sent digital audio tracks back and forth, finding a crazed workflow of creative refuge.  Jill happened to track the vocals for the song "Hell is Other People" during the insurrection on Jan 6th, and this Sartre quote became the title of the finished album.

When the dust settled we found ourselves with thirteen songs that we were able to fully finish, resulting in an LP and EP. We were pleased to have David Gaumé mix and master the EP and Ross Brown mix the LP with Eureka Mastering preparing it for vinyl. 

The EP, "Land of the Blind" will be digitally released in late June, as well as on cassette. 
The LP, "Hell is Other People" will be digitally released in fall 2021, as well as on vinyl.

So far all of our expenses to record, mix, master, and package these projects have been out of pocket, as we are not on a record label. We are hoping you can help us with the final expense of having the physical vinyl and cassette units produced by preordering them here. There is no risk involved, we will go through with producing these in tangible form no matter what because we have already put so much work into this project.

Thank you SO much in advance for your support!

 

Redder Moon began as one of Jeremiah James Gonzales’ many music projects. A more electronic and obscure sound than much of his other work (including Knife Crime, Be/Non, Rhunes, Elevator Division, Umberto), the sentiment of a melodic post-apocalypse slowly developed for the first seven years, also involving past members Matthew Naquin (original collaborator) Nick Banister (drums) and Jon VanSickle (live drums)

Brody Lowe moved to Kansas City from Portland, in 2019 met Jeremiah and quickly found his place in reviving the layered synths and dance undertones of the moody, mostly instrumental music. Lowe is a quiet presence behind a large scope of music videos, album art, and other creative content, his music ranging from video game scores and band collaborations to his solo project, Loqsa. 

Just as Gonzales and Lowe began collaborating on new material ranging from darkwave to shoegaze to synthpop genres, Jill McKeever joined as a vocalist/lyricist during the uncertain year of 2020. A violinist in her early music projects led her to a degree in Electronic Art where she explored video and music recording. McKeever’s perfume brand, For Strange Women induced a 13-year detour from music before she found her way back during the quiet of quarantine.

story:
About Pao Pamaki


Hi ! I am Pao Pamaki, I am a musician, singer-songwriter, producer and visual artist.
Music is my life! It is my passion, profession and my gift to the world.

During my travels, my heart has been touched by many different kinds of music. I have studied and experimented, and I am inspired especially by the ancient wisdom and traditions of the Native people from America.
I have played with musicians across the globe, and I was the main vocalist,
make up artist and performer in "Rütrance Band" over 4 years.


I am ready to share my music with the world, and I am in the process of recording an album with many of my compositions accompanied by amazing musicians. 


Its so important for me right now to manifest this dream. It will really support me to reach the next level in my life as a professional musician. 

My music is created with the intention to be a path to the heart space and a soft rhythmical sound to move the body and emotions.
I sing in different languages as a prayer for nature and expressing my gratitude for life.

*****Music is the rope that connect me to the source
Music is the ocean of infinite colours*****
 

The Impact

To make it happen :

I need to invest in some professional equipment to continue the recordings in my home studio and get your support to be able to pay the people that will work on it.

With your support I will be able to:

-Record this album in high quality sound, and continue to release more music following this release! 

-Give a decent energy exchange to amazing musicians that will bring so much to the music.

-Have an amazing post production and mix.

-Have this new album released in the Label "Uma Sai".

-Create a digital album cover with a digital book containing all the lyrics, credits and more surprises inside.

-Film a video clip that will expand my music to the world.

-Rise to the next level in my professional life as a musician.
 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We need to reach the goal of :  9429€ 

Here's where your funds will go if we rich the goal !

-I need to invest in a condenser microphone, a sound card, headphones and studio monitors to be able to continue to record myself and some of the invited musicians. 

-I need to pay the musicians that will compose and record for my album:

*Hand Pan 
*Violin 
*Cello
*Percussions
*Flute
*Double bass
*charango
*Second voice

-I need to pay the two producers Baptiste Sejourne and Pablo Vicencio that already started working on few of the tracks and will continue with the post production, giving a touch of magic with synths and effects and they will also mix all of the tracks on the album.

-I need to pay for album artwork.

-And for the Video clip recording and editing.
 

Professional equipment : 1761 €
Musicians : 2490 €
Post-Production, recoding of Percussions and Mix : 3400 €
Artwork : 300 €
Video clip :  700€
Fees : around 9% of what we raise will go to the Indiegogo platform fee and credit card processing fees will cost at least 778,59 €
 

As a Thank You for your support, I have included some exciting perks :

 

*Get my first E.P : Receive my first E.P, Digital in Wav and MP3 + Album cover .

*Digital Album : Receive the New digital album in Wav and MP3 plus the digital album cover and book .

*Live Recorded Medicine music covers: Receive a live recording compilation of medicine songs from amazing artists that I always love to sing and share.
Live recording with invited musicians.

*Vocal Coaching : Take a private lesson with me, or consult about vocal arranging! You'll get one-on-one time and musical inspiration!
Zoom calls or in person in Bali.

*Vocal Coaching package: Go deeper with a journey of private lessons with me! You'll get one-on-one time and musical inspiration! Classes must be taken within a 6 month period, Zoom calls or in person in Bali.

*Zoom call Concert : Private online concert with hight quality sound and sharing about the music and life style!

*Private Intimate Concert : When I am in Europe, in summer or if we are in the same country!
I offer a private concert.

*Private Juicy Concert : Same! When I am in Europe in summer or we are in the same country
I offer a private concert with invited musician.

*Artwork: If you love my artwork, I’m also offering commissioned artwork, black and white ink drawings, A4 size. 
Or/And  Digital version with possibility of photoshop touch to make some colours and layers effects like 2 of the ones here below, the blue women on the right and the central one with the power animal of South America, and the pink one (look to the perks on the side).

If we don't reach the goal :

The funds will still go immediately into creating this album. 
If I do not have enough funds, I might not do a music video or a cheaper one.
I might not be able to pay all of the invited musicians as much as I wish.
I might need to buy cheaper equipment. 

If we exceed the goal !

I will be able to get better equipment , which means: even better quality recording! 
It will help me to pay for a photo shoot and the creation of a web site.
I might be able to have it ready before, asking help to other producer to help me.
I could create more than one video clip!
And of course make me so happy and allow me to relax and give even more than 100% love in the work…


Risks & Challenges


-I wish to release this album as soon as possible but I put this distant release date to be sure not to have delay considering  :

-the shipping time of the professional equipment  in those times of  pandemics.

-Some countries are still in lock down and the studio professional material that I need might take longer to get to me.

-The delay that can happen in the distant communication with the other musicians.

-The fact that I will do all the guitar and voices recording, editing, effects and pre-mix  by myself.

-All the editing, effects and pre-mix of other instruments by myself.

-I really hope that all will work out in the best way and the album will be release in Jun 2021   : )


 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have backed the project and are looking for other ways to support us (or you can't back me right now) here are some other ways to support me !

Tell your friends and family ! 

Share this page to help spread the word and more importantly share why you support my project and music to create more connections between us!
I would really appreciate short videos sharing why you love this music and message to help me get more support !
You can post on facebook and instagram with a link to this crowdfunding !


Like my page : 
https://www.facebook.com/PaoPamakiMusic
Follow me on Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/pao.pamaki/
Follow me on you tube :
 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCksom7tCnAJstV...
 

****Thank you so much for your support, it means so much to me to share this music****

story:
Hello!

My name is Ginni, I'm a jazz vocalist who loves to worship! Over the past three years, I have been blessed to have the opportunity to lead worship for my congregation in Philadelphia. During this time I have been creating and sharing several of my worship songs that I have written over the past years. My musical background is in jazz, where I have studied jazz vocals and have gigged over the past 10 years. However, through my experiences I have found that there is truly nothing more fulfilling than to create and sing songs to God, while leading others to God through worship. This is why I have started this worship project, in order to take action by professionally recording four of my worship songs that fully express the creative voice and calling that God has placed in my heart. I strongly believe that now is the time to share these worship songs for the encouragement of the body of Messiah and to be a light to the whole world.

 

The Details

I have connected with a believing music producer from Nashville, Tennessee who will be overseeing the production of this music project. The funds from this campaign will go directly to producing four of my worship songs, which we will be releasing as singles separately throughout the year. In order to share these songs I will need to raise $8,500 total. Specifically, the majority of the funds (85%) will go directly towards studio recording time, professional musicians, mixing, and mastering of each of the songs. The remaining funds (15%) will go towards music videos, cover art, promotions, and administration expenses. 

It would be such a blessing for you to partner with me in this journey and I’m so excited to share this with you, encourage you, and pray God bless you as you sow into this adventure with me. I have created several fun perks as a way for me to thank and bless you for your contributions.

Why?

For the past several years I have been blessed with the opportunity to lead worship in many different settings. Through the worship, I have received testimonies of healing and salvation of all ages! Whenever I share one of my worship songs, someone always comes up to me later and tells me how much it moves them and then they would ask me where they can get a recording. Sadly, I never had anything to give them. But that will change with the fulfillment of this project. I believe these amazing experiences are just a small glimpse of what God wants to do with these songs once they are fully recorded professionally. My goal is to set our gaze up and away from ourselves and our circumstances, while worshipping our Anointed King on His throne as He delights in us. I wholeheartedly believe that this is the time to act in being a light to our suffering world and a part of God’s healing plan!

How you can help!

Thank you so much for taking the time to listen to my story! I would love for you to join me in this journey. Please keep me and my team in your prayers as we work on bringing these songs to life and any contribution would go a long way in supporting this project and getting my worship songs out to the world. It would be greatly appreciated if you could spread the word about this project to your communities by sharing this project with your friends. Indiegogo has several quick and easy ways to share this campaign through social media and email.

God bless you and I can't wait to share with you these songs of worship that have been in my heart for many years!

Thank you!

There are a few people I would like to thank who have already helped me in this process so far...

To my promise keeping God, Yeshua, Jesus. My husband, Adam, who is my solid ground, stability, security, reliability, and my comforter. Joe Miterko for his enthusiasm, joy, constant encouragement, and friendship. Thank you to Elsie Bennett, for her direction, resources, wisdom, encouragement, and camaraderie. Thank you to Aidan Carter Guynez, for making this beautiful video and really capturing me and my vision at its essence and purity. Thank you to Caleb De Ruiter, for taking and finding footage of me at the Boardwalk Chapel from 5 years ago for this video.

Thank you Dad, for the many hours you spent looking for old clips of me for this video.

To my sisters Christine Bonnivier and Andrea Yesner, who cheer me on and pick me up when I fall, thank you. 

Thank you to my dear family, and mom, for praying for me, sharing their excitement.

 

Thank you to all my friends who have specifically been praying for me and praying for protection over me during this process: Debbie Chernoff, Arlene Buffum, Hope Doxtader, Lauren Argetta, Rebecca Marino, Sarah Pogue, Myke Collins, Melissa Brown, Adam Hartlaub, Brian Behler, Chris Byrd, Isaiah & Calli-Jade English, Faith Crowley, and all the women in my bible study.

 

Thank you to the messianic community and my congregation CBY. Getting to grow with them and write music and sing for them. For their love, encouragement, support and for the opportunity to serve them. Thank you MIQEDEM for their prayer, support, and inspiration. And to the MJAA, where I can bless Israel, work from home, and sing during the work day.

The funds from this campaign will go directly to producing four of my worship songs, which we will be releasing as singles separately throughout the year. In order to share these songs I will need to raise $8,500 total. Specifically, the majority of the funds (85%) will go directly towards studio recording time, professional musicians, mixing, and mastering of each of the songs. The remaining funds (15%) will go towards music videos, cover art, promotions, and administration expenses. 
It would be such a blessing for you to partner with me in this journey and I’m so excited to share this with you, encourage you, and pray God bless you as you sow into this adventure with me. I have created several fun perks as a way for me to thank and bless you for your contributions.

Why?
For the past several years I have been blessed with the opportunity to lead worship in many different settings. Through the worship, I have received testimonies of healing and salvation of all ages! Whenever I share one of my worship songs, someone always comes up to me later and tells me how much it moves them and then they would ask me where they can get a recording. Sadly, I never had anything to give them. But that will change with the fulfillment of this project. I believe these amazing experiences are just a small glimpse of what God wants to do with these songs once they are fully recorded professionally. My goal is to set our gaze up and away from ourselves and our circumstances, while worshipping our Anointed King on His throne as He delights in us. I wholeheartedly believe that this is the time to act in being a light to our suffering world and a part of God’s healing plan!

How you can help!
Thank you so much for taking the time to listen to my story! I would love for you to join me in this journey. Please keep me and my team in your prayers as we work on bringing these songs to life and any contribution would go a long way in supporting this project and getting my worship songs out to the world. It would be greatly appreciated if you could spread the word about this project to your communities by sharing this project with your friends. Indiegogo has several quick and easy ways to share this campaign through social media and email.
God bless you and I can't wait to share with you these songs of worship that have been in my heart for many years!
Thank you!
There are a few people I would like to thank who have already helped me in this process so far...
To my promise keeping God, Yeshua, Jesus. My husband, Adam, who is my solid ground, stability, security, reliability, and my comforter. Joe Miterko for his enthusiasm, joy, constant encouragement, and friendship. Thank you to Elsie Bennett, for her direction, resources, wisdom, encouragement, and camaraderie. Thank you to Aidan Carter Guynez, for making this beautiful video and really capturing me and my vision at its essence and purity. Thank you to Caleb De Ruiter, for taking and finding footage of me at the Boardwalk Chapel from 5 years ago for this video.
Thank you Dad, for the many hours you spent looking for old clips of me for this video.
To my sisters Christine Bonnivier and Andrea Yesner, who cheer me on and pick me up when I fall, thank you. 
Thank you to my dear family, and mom, for praying for me, sharing their excitement.
 
Thank you to all my friends who have specifically been praying for me and praying for protection over me during this process: Debbie Chernoff, Arlene Buffum, Hope Doxtader, Lauren Argetta, Rebecca Marino, Sarah Pogue, Myke Collins, Melissa Brown, Adam Hartlaub, Brian Behler, Chris Byrd, Isaiah & Calli-Jade English, Faith Crowley, and all the women in my bible study. Thank you to the messianic community and my congregation CBY. Getting to grow with them and write music and sing for them. For their love, encouragement, support and for the opportunity to serve them. Thank you MIQEDEM for their prayer, support, and inspiration. And to the MJAA, where I can bless Israel, work from home, and sing during the work day.

story:
Short Summary

     Hi! We are Fallstar, and I’m Chris(Cream). We’ve been touring and making records since 2005. We’ve been unsigned and signed to labels. We’ve played shows for thousands of fans, and played shows to a rooms of 3 fans. We feel so blessed and privileged to have met so many amazing people throughout our weird wild journey. We love making music and plan on releasing records forever. 

As many of you know, since 2016 we have been writing for our new album. And I am so so  happy and proud to say it is finally finished and even better than our last record. After more than 4 years, 63 song demos, and lots of frustration/joy, I again can say that I believe all good things take time. The road to this new record was long, but we’re almost there!!!

So many of you have helped us to continue making music these past 4 years. Our album FUTURE GOLDEN AGE, and our other band Northlander’s FORCES OF LIGHT, would literally have never existed without your help, and now these records have taken us around the world, and reached half a million ears in total streams. That is incredible for a small band like ours, and I really hope these records brought some joy into your life. Now here we are once again, sitting on a fully written album with the promise that it will absolutely rule, and we need your help to make it happen!

What We Need & What We're Offering

The name of our new album is SUNBREATHER. It contains 11 of our best songs yet. Here’s the things we need to pay for to make this possible, and the unique perks we are offering for this crowdfunding campaign.

Production - In order to bring out the best possible version of these songs we can, we are getting these songs mixed by Ryan Furlott and mastered by Mike Kalijian of Rogue Planet Mastering(My Chemical Romance, A Day to Remember, Paramore). Mike and Ryan did all the work for the Northlander record and Ryan mixed our last Fallstar record as well. They do amazing work and we know they would make these songs sound incredible. 

Music in Physical Format - For this release we are offering SUNBREATHER not just on CD but on Vinyl as well. This is something we have always wanted to offer, and this felt like the record to make it happen.

Merch - Rewards for this crowdfunding effort.

With everything said and done, we should be able to clear all of these expenses if we raise $5,000. All the money we raised in streaming the last Fallstar album went to pay for most of the Northlander album, and we hope if we make any money off streams from SUNBREATHER, that this too will fund another Northlander album. See how that works?! 

In this campaign we’re offering some pretty cool new perks and rewards, and we're trying to make it as special as possible. Along with offering the album on Vinyl, some packages will include a Fallstar COVERS album! In this collection of songs we’ll take a crack at some of our favorite songs by P.O.D., Rage Against the Machine, and DC Talk, to name a few. We are also opening the second half of the record to requested songs. I am excited and terrified to see what some of you will make us do:) -please no bohemian rhapsody… please- We're also offering more of Bryan’s custom made sweatshirts from SLEEPLATE.CO, and this time we made girls shirts too! And finally, for the sake of history and future trips down memory lane, selected rewards feature your name in album credits and a polaroid thank you card from us. Also if this record is funded I promise to make a podcast about this record, just like the one I did for FORCES OF LIGHT.

The Impact

As we are currently an independent band, we exist solely on the support of our friends and fans of our bands. After completing 2 successful crowdfunding campaigns we are even more humbled by that fact. 159 individuals brought FUTURE GOLDEN AGE to the world, and 60 people helped us complete the process of bringing FORCES OF LIGHT to life. Those aren’t huge numbers. While some of our songs have over 100k listens, it really is a small group of people who keep us alive as a band, and these crowdfund campaigns are our bread and butter. Though this process is extremely nerve racking, you have managed to keep us afloat and gave us the chance to make our best records to date!

Risks & Challenges

As with any album crowd funding campaign, there is the risk we don’t meet our goal. Especially now in this crazy time in history. If now is a difficult time to contribute financially, you can still help! Please share our campaign on social media and utilize the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the page. 

As with any of our last crowdfund campaigns, we don't have a backup plan. We have sunk all of our resources into these songs and we are putting all our chips in on this record. We would love for an established label to pick up this record later and do actual promotion and press for it to give it a wider reach in the world, but as of now, this record will not get made without your help! Thanks for your support and so excited for you all to hear these songs!

Much Loves, 

Chris

 

Additional Rewards Info

FREE and LOW SHIPPING CHARGES!!!

To show our gratitude for your support, we do our best to make these perks/rewards as cool as possible. Also we really wanted to keep the pricing low and shipping as minimal as possible. So every item under $40 is FREE shipping and everything above is only $5. So no crazy math required at checkout. Also all add on items are free shipping.

Item Add Ons

This is a new feature in Indiegogo. After you select your perk you are able to add on certain items before checkout. Again these will not change your shipping cost. I tried to make these options not overlap with the standard rewards/perks, and I think there's some pretty cool options. Like I said this is a new feature and required a lot of mental gymnastics, so if something seems like a dumb idea or if it doesn't combine shipping properly then just email me and I'll fix it that day. We've tested it all out and it seems to work just fine, but just in case it doesn't, you know who to call:)

Colored VINYL

For this record we are pressing a very limited supply of 100 Colored Vinyl copies of SUNBREATHER. These are only available through this Crowdfund or a live show. We're not entirely sure what color the Vinyl will be, but it will be the coolest design we can find. Expect color somewhere along the lines of the album art color palette. Also the company manufacturing the records has a very good reputation for fast delivery, so we are pretty confident with the October delivery date, but if there's any delay we'll keep you updated.

T-Shirts

All printed on Bella/Canvas shirts. Girls shirts printed on Bella Canvas as well.

Hoodies

Really stoked on these new SUNBREATHER hoodies in Lavander and Mint. This is as colorful as we will ever get and we are only printing 10 in each color. And I'm taking one of Lavander colored ones...so 19:) These will be the single most expensive piece of merch we have ever made, but we're happy to offer it at $50. Two color design printed on Independent Trading Company 10oz Heavyweight Pullover Hoodie.

Fallstar Adidas looking black Hoodie is printed on Bella Canvas 7oz Fleece Pullover Hoodie. 

Fallstar Cover Song Album

Holy Damn so excited for this!!! Along with a few favorite songs we have selected to cover, this is your chance to hear our take on any song of your choosing! Pitch in with friends or choose for yourself. We'll prolly only do this once, because it's a ton of work, but it sounds so fun so now is your chance. You want Journey?! You want Papa Roach? Heck, you want Taking Back Sunday? Go crazy! Songs will be mixed and mastered by Cream in the Rat Family Studio, so they will sound good, but not as good as SUNBREATHER:) Expect this EP or Full length in your inbox by Christmas. This will be the only place to download this Fallstar Covers Album. We will never sell this music, and we may or may not ever put it up on Spotify. Confirmed songs so far are...

P.O.D. - Southtown

Rage Against the Machine - Testify

DC Talk - Jesus Freak

You decide the rest! (we also might pick another one or two that we're dying to cover... the list is long)

story:
Operation: Bringing Back

TRUE Country Music!!!! 

                   

 

Please watch the video above!   

Hi!  My name is Matt Herren, and I am a neo-traditional country singer/songwriter on a mission to bring REAL country music back in style (and hopefully to the radio again)! 

Matt Herren at Hilltop Recording Studio in Nashville, TN. 

This is my first BIG, legit studio album that I have ever made!  I dreamed of making beautiful music that true country fans miss complete with: 

  • the steel guitar and fiddle 
  • songs with simple melodies and lyrics that speak to you
  • NO pop or rap beats - REAL drums only!!! 
  • Stories that everyday people can relate to - God, Country, Family, and Hard Times! 

 

So far, we have achieved that with my upcoming album titled American Dream.  You can hear some clips of the songs I have recorded already in the video up above and see some of the making of them in videos below.  I wrote or cowrote three of the songs on the album (The Grass Ain't Always Greener, What Country Is To Me, and The Love Of My Life).  

 

The remaining 7 songs were all carefully chosen from thousands of songs that were pitched to me from amazing songwriters in Nashville and all over the US- a few were grammy-award winning.  A couple are severely underrated songwriters and remarkable musicians.  I am honored to be able to cut their songs.   I've chosen each song on purpose because it spoke to me, and I felt it emotionally.  I think that's what REAL country music does for us.  

 

Recording American Dream (the title track song) 

 

Right now, I am working with my producer Tony Ray Jones and my wife and music manager, Heather Herren, on finalizing the arrangements for the second half of the album.  Tony is AMAZING at his job.  These songs are gonna knock your socks off!  It's gonna be killer!!!!!  (Well, hopefully it won't kill you - but more like entertain you.  Haha!)

Matt Herren and Producer Tony Ray Jones 

 

The lineup is as follows:

  1. a sad, cheating ballad (I mean, what's more traditional country than that?)
  2. a couple upbeat, blue collar living songs
  3. a shaking your fist at the government song
  4. a couple love ballads
  5. a ballad about living with loss
  6. a waltz about what true country music really is to me
  7. an upbeat, mid-tempo song about living life to the fullest
  8. an upbeat song about having fun with your significant other
  9. a mid-tempo drinking song (can't leave that out of a REAL country album)

If you could reach into my head, pull out my thoughts about life, and turn them into songs - it would be this album.  

Tony helped me assemble the perfect band to bring these songs to life including Grammy-award winning, legendary guitarist, Brent Mason.  If you don't know who Brent Mason is, his most famous signature lick is the intro to Alan Jackson's Chatahoochee.  Man, can that guy play!  

 

Brent Mason, Tony Ray Jones, and Matt Herren 

I am also blessed to have Lonnie Wilson on drums.  He was the drummer in George Strait's Ace In The Hole Band.  Bruce Bouton played my favorite instrument - the steel guitar.  He played steel on all of Garth Brooks' records.  He's also a phenomenal songwriter and co-wrote a song on Brooks' "Ropin' The Wind" album.

Bruce Bouton on steel guitar and Matt Herren  

I've also been blessed with Joel Key on acoustic guitar, Duncan Mullins on bass, Aubrey Haynie on fiddle, and Johnny Brown on piano.  These guys are the A-team, and they are making this record sound PHENOMENAL!!!! 

 
The band working together on the arrangement for my original song
 "The Grass Ain't Always Greener"
 
In addition, I was fortunate enough to get award-winning vocalists, Chip and Billy Davis, as my backup singers.  They toured with Alabama as backup singers, and are grammy-award winning songwriters, as well.  
 
      Billy Davis, Chip Davis, Matt Herren, Heather Herren 
 

I am planning to market this album everywhere, and I expect GREAT BIG things to happen once it is released late this fall.  My goal is to start touring by the end of the year.  

 

Now, for the purpose in this campaign.  

I chose to be an independent artist so that a record label couldn't hijack my music, overproduce it with pop and rap beats, and turn it into something that I don't like.  I don't think fans of country music would like that either.  I think those of us who love country music miss when it ACTUALLY sounded country!  For me, it's ALL ABOUT THE ART!  As an independent artist, a label doesn't get to tell me what to do!!!!!!  

-Not that I am fully against labels.  If one offered me a record deal but didn't try to change me into pop or bro country, I'd be crazy to say no.  But I doubt that will happen in today's day and age of digital drumbeats and crossover genres forced on the radio.  

Since I am an independent artist without a label, I have to finance EVERYTHING!  I paid for the first half of the album out of pocket with my own hard-earned money.  But, as you can imagine, creating a radio-quality record with this A-team band ain't cheap!  My wife and I sold our second car and emptied our savings account to do the first half because this is MY American Dream.  

So I am asking you to partner with me on financing the remainder of the album.  YOU can collectively be my label!  In exchange, you will get rewarded with some AWESOME, EXCLUSIVE and LIMITED-EDITION perks that CANNOT be purchased at any other time.  Once this crowdfunding campaign is over, the opportunity to get these perks will be gone, too.   

 

 

How I Will Spend The Money

The goal that we have set is: $13,972.  That includes the following: 

  • Studio time at the legendary Hilltop Studios in Nashville, TN (infamous studio where legends like Dolly Parton, Alan Jackson, Merle Haggard, Waylon Jennings, Johnny Cash, Loretta Lynn and MORE have recorded back in their heydays!)  
  • Session musician pay
  • Producer and sound engineer fees
  • Travel to Nashville (we will have to stay for almost a week to finish the album).
  • Indiegogo payment processing fees
  • CD printing
  • Perks manufacturing and shipping
  • Songwriter splits / mechanical royalties
  • Graphics and photography 
  • Lunch for the band on recording day.  (This may not seem like a necessity, BUT short of doing something CRAZY like robbing a bank or dancing naked around a pole, I'll do whatever I have to do to get these A-lister band members to come back and play on my record. Haha!) According to EVERYONE who is ANYONE in Nashville, that's how it used to be done in the good old days before LA took over.  Since my mission is to bring old country back in style, why not treat the band the way they used to be treated when Nashville was still Nashville? These guys are legends, and they deserve to be treated as such.  So if a couple hundred dollars to cater lunch in is what makes them happy, then I am gonna make that happen if I can! 

 

If we happen to overfund (Lord, Jesus please let us overfund), I will put that money toward a publicist, album release party, digital marketing campaign, a tour manager, and a booking agent. What good will it do to have this PHENOMENAL REAL COUNTRY ALBUM if no one hears it???  My ultimate goal is to go on tour, promote this album, and meet some of my fans in person!  

 

 

 

How YOU are rewarded for your contribution.   

We have some AMAZING PERKS for you.   If you are on a mobile phone, you will see them scroll across the top. On a computer, they'll be on the right-hand side of the screen.  Some perks include: 

  • Physical CD with limited-edition 20+ page, custom insert including lyrics, photos from recording the album, and more!  It will also be autographed.  
  • Matt Herren 2022 Calendar. (I think this is weird because I wouldn't want a calendar with 12 of my photos in it.  But when I polled my fans, that's what they said they wanted.  So, we're gonna make it happen.  Haha!)
  • Autographed photo
  • Album T-shirt 
  • T-shirt/CD combo - save 12% when you bundle.  
  • One hour private video chat with me (and of course I'll serenade you, too!) for $99! 

 

 

    

 

  • Ultimate Fan Pack including  $415 worth of value for only $175 including the following:
    • Limited edition physical CD with custom insert (autographed and personalized) - can only get the personalization in the Ultimate Fan Pack
    • Limited Edition Album Cover T-Shirt
    • Personalized and autographed keychain (can only get the personalization and autograph in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
    • Limited edition, autographed photo
    • Signed photocopies of the original handwritten lyrics of the three songs that I wrote for this album.  My wife, Heather, who is the co-writer on two of the songs will also autograph the two that she collaborated with me on. (You can ONLY get the signed lyrics in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
    • Flash drive that will include behind-the-scenes photos, videos, and audio clippings of the making of this album.  (You can ONLY get the flash drive in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
    • Personalized thank you video from Matt (only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
    • Name listed on the website as an American Dream supporter
    • Name listed in the custom insert as a VIP supporter (only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
    • Limited Edition, signed album cover poster (only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
    • Limited Edition American Dream refillable ink pen (only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
    • FREE ticket to a virtual album launch concert on Facebook ($19.99 value - only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack
    • FREE ticket to the virtual VIP after-party on Zoom with Matt, Heather, and The Matt Pack ($65.00 Value only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
    • FREE ticket to a paid live Q&A with Momma Violet (Matt's Mom) and Momma Marie (Heather's Mom) - The Pack Momma's Tell All ($15.00 value - only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
    • Coupon for 20% off the entire cart  on mattherrenmusic.com (only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
    • Early access to the music - digital download code one week before everyone else - only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack
    • FREE shipping included for US addresses 

 

  • One of our BIG WAMMY PERKS this time is LIFETIME floor seats at any concert for life with VIP Backstage passes for two people for only $1,000!  You heard me correctly!  LIFETIME SEATS!  GUARANTEED!  You also get the Ultimate Fan Pack perks, as well! These are limited in quantity - only 15 available.  But what a heck of a deal that is! 

 

 

  • My other BIG WAMMY PERK is a home/private concert for $10,000!  I will travel anywhere in the continental US and sing for any private event or put on a show just for you and your guests!  You also get the contents of the Ultimate Fan Pack included.  Limited in quantity.  ONLY 5 available! 

 

  • If you want to help but can't afford much, we have an opportunity for you to get your name on the website for ONLY $3!  

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

  1. Subscribe to be a monthly supporter of Matt Herren Music for only $4.99 per month (on Facebook), and get a lot of cool behind-the-scenes videos and photos of the making of my music and me hanging out with my family and friends.  This is like Matt and Heather reality TV.  It's raw, real, and unedited footage of our daily lives.  You also get first access to new music that I write as well as special offers and discounts ONLY offered to monthly supporters.  
  2. Re-contribute.  You can use the campaign to buy early Christmas presents for family and friends, donate a physical CD to a fan in need, or just plain donate some extra money to my campaign even after you have gotten the perks that you want.  You can re-contribute as much as you want without limit. 

 

Even if you can't afford to contribute money, there are some other ways that you can contribute and REALLY help!!!  

  1. Please shout from the rooftop to all your friends and family who LOVE traditional country music !!!!  Share this campaign EVERYWHERE and OFTEN!  Tell everyone you know that I am trying my hardest to bring traditional country music back! 
  2. Use the Indiegogo share tools!  
  3. Pray for the campaign's success!  
  4. Post a comment here on the campaign page and tell everyone what you HONESTLY think about my music.  I love feedback (good or bad), and I think other people love to hear honest feedback, as well.  
  5. Every dollar, every comment, every share, and every prayer helps! 

 

 

 

 

EVERYONE GETS THE MUSIC!!!!!!

 

The last time I ran a crowdfunding campaign, I had a digital CD download code as an option.  It went over well, but some people were confused about when they were getting a digital download and when they were getting a physical CD.  

Also, I noticed that some of my fans could only afford a certain amount, and they really wanted to help.  So they bought the most expensive perk that they could afford, which may have left them without the ability to also get the music.  For example, they purchased a limited edition tee (because it cost more and they felt like they were contributing more), but then they couldn't afford to buy the music.  

I also had some fans that couldn't afford more than a couple dollars.  They contributed what they could, but they couldn't afford even the digital CD.  

What I have learned over this last year is that ALL people go through hard times, and country music fans turn to the music for therapy.  I want to make sure that everyone has access to this music -even if they are on a fixed income and can only afford a couple dollars.  So, EVERYONE who contributes to my campaign, even if it is only $3 to get your name on the website, will get a FREE download code for the FULL ALBUM!  

You heard that correctly: THE ENTIRE ALBUM!!!!  I don't want anyone to miss out on experiencing this music because I am SO proud of it!  If you are grieving, you NEED to hear Gone.  That song is so therapeutic.  I really think it will help everyone! 

If you are needing an upbeat song to forget your troubles, My Life's A Country Song, is perfect! If you love traditional country, you just can't hear that song and not want to sing along and tap your foot or get up and dance.   

For these reasons, I just feel in my gut that everyone should get to hear the music.  

If you buy the ULTIMATE FAN PACK or a higher priced perk, you will get your code one week early - before everyone else does.  

 

 

REWARD FOR CONTRIBUTING EARLY

 

I like to pay it back and reward people who are the first to help me out.  

So, if you contribute ANYTHING (even $3) in the first 72 hours (Thursday, June 3rd, Friday June 4th, or Saturday, June 5th 2021), I will send you a FREE American Dream (the single) ringtone as soon as the campaign ends.  This ringtone won't be available for download at any other time.  This is the ONLY way to get this ringtone.  

But wait . . . there's MORE!  

In addition, you will also receive two FREE entries into a raffle for a ton of giveaways that we are doing in the middle of this campaign with hand-crafted one-of-a-kind merchandise that will NEVER be available for sale.  You'll be able to purchase more entries into this raffle, but you will get two FREE entries just for contributing in the first 72 hours! 

 

WAIT!  There's EVEN MORE . . . . 

In addition, you'll also get an acoustic, stripped down version of my song What Country Is To Me - the first song my wife, Heather, and I ever wrote together.  This song will be on the album, fully produced with a 7-piece band.  However, while you're waiting on the album to be finished and the perks to be shipped, you'll get this acoustic recording to tide you over.  

 

*The ringtone and acoustic download will be emailed soon after the campaign ends and the contributions are locked.

 

Handcrafted, one-of-a-kind, autographed tumblers donated for the raffle by Tumbling Creations. 

 

Some of the items we will be raffling off are:

  1. Custom American Dream and Matt Herren tumblers, handcrafted by Tumbling Creations (owner Jasca is a Matt Pack Member) and also autographed by me.  Each item is sealed in resin, so my autograph will not wear off.  Jasca's handcrafted designs usually retail for $35 to $50+ in value (without my autograph). 
  2. Custom jewelry and keychains handcrafted by ReGal Creations (owner Loreli is a Matt Pack member). Some items include a male necklace with the Matt Pack wolf head mascot and a female necklace with pictures of Matt Herren.  They contain round bezels and all components are stainless steel.  The charms are Tibetan silver.  The cording and tassels are leather.  Some of the decorative bezels and clips are cast in zinc alloy.  These items range in retail value from $15 to $50 each.  
  3. $150 gift certificate to Backwoods Recording Studio in Nashville, TN (where I recorded my first EP, Made For Me) courtesy of my producer, Tony Ray Jones, and his wife Patty Jones.   It is good for up to 3 hours of studio time.  You can use it for recording a single or couple songs.  It's also great if you wanted to record a karaoke CD for family or friends.   
  4. A 1-hour private chat with me (and my wife Heather if you also want to chat with her) - a $99 value - paid for and donated by Denise Reim (A Matt Pack member).  If you buy the Chat as a perk and you win this, you can get a private, virtual concert or a two-hour chat. Chat must be used within the first 90 days. 
  5. A surprise Matt Pack item valued at over $150 paid for and donated by Becky Andree (A Matt Pack Member). 
  6. And anything else that a fan may offer to make or donate between now and then.  I will autograph everything that I possibly can! Every handcrafted item that will be raffled off will be custom and one-of-a-kind.  They cannot be purchased anywhere else -ever! 

 

Handcrafted, one-of-a-kind, jewelry donated for the raffle by ReGal Creations. 

 

 

*If these items don't entice you, I am also auctioning off my second guitar (George), to the highest bidder.   (I will autograph it live during the auction).   There will be a secret reserve to be met. 

 

 

Shipping and Pricing

Shipping anywhere in the US is included in these perks prices, and we made it as affordable as we could for countries outside of the US.  We also had to build in profit to have the money to finish making the music.  So PLEASE keep that in mind when reviewing the prices.  We tried to keep everything as affordable as possible and build in as much value as possible.  However, at the end of the day, the point is to make a profit so we can make some GREET music!  So these perks are fundraiser-item priced. 

 

What Happens If I Don't Reach The Goal

If we don't reach this goal, we can't make this album quickly.  Plain and simple.  I am asking for the MINIMUM amount needed to finish off this album and fulfill these perks.  I can't cut any corners without sacrificing the quality of the music, so there is no way to do it any cheaper.  SO, if I don't make the goal, the money will be kept in our account until we can save or raise the remainder needed to complete the project and fulfill the perks.  I WILL finish recording this album.  When I am able to do it will depend on how much money I raise during this campaign.  (I don't want you skipping a rent payment or letting your dogs starve, but aside from that, your money is SO important and appreciated NOW more than I could ever describe in words.)  

 

TRUST

I know sometimes it's hard to trust people on crowdfunding sites - especially if it is someone you have no relationship with or have never met in person.  I get that. I want to reassure you that you WILL get your perks!  I may be just a simple, country boy from Arkansas with not much to my name, but the one thing I have is integrity.  My word is my bond.  If I tell you I am gonna do something, then I do it.  I can't promise much, but I can promise that you can trust me.  

AND, I can promise that you'll LOVE this album if you love REAL country music reminiscent of 90's style country like Alan Jackson and George Strait.   I live to make fans happy, and that is all I am trying to do here with the music and the perks.  

Just to ease your mind . . .Here are some quotes and pics from the first crowdfunding campaign that I did when I raised money for an EP.  (Mind you, this wasn't the same quality music as I am going to be putting out this time.  I didn't have a live band).  I didn't raise enough money to make music to the quality that I wanted to.  However, I promised that I would make a CD to the highest quality of music that I could with the money raised.  I set out to make my fans a CD because they were asking for it, and I delivered one as promised.  

 

 

Matt Pack Cares!

Here's one final incentive for you to partner with me on completing this album.  I love to give back, and my fans (The Matt Pack) do, too!  As a promise to my entire existing fan group (and any new fans I may acquire during this process), if we reach the entire funding goal, I will donate 150 digital download codes for the entire album to anyone who is currently or has formerly served in the military.  I believe we, as a society, owe them so much more, but this is what we can collectively do to thank them for their sacrifices.  

 

 

 

I will ALSO donate 150 codes to current cancer patients or their family members.  As a former cancer patient with childhood leukemia, I know the stress and toll that illness can take on a family. Music (especially: traditional country music) was the only escape that I had during those trying times.  If I can offer that same kind of escape and coping mechanism, then I am honored to be in a position to be able to do that.  

Matt Herren listening to country music at St. Jude Research Hospital in 1997. 

 

Matt Herren playing keyboard in the hospital bed at St. Jude.  Also pictured are two of the nurses who cared for him during his stay at the hospital. 

 

Finally, I want to thank everyone who has been following my journey and listening to my music, so far.  I owe every ounce of success that I have had to God, my supportive family,  my producer, Tony Ray, and especially my amazing fanbase, The Matt Pack!  Without all of ya'll, I wouldn't be where I am right now.  You have shown me that together, we can move mountains!  

 

So if you are as excited as I am about this new album, what are  you waiting for?  Contribute NOW.  Get your desired perks before they're all gone!  We have limited quantities on many of the items so that we can control the manufacturing costs.  Contribute early so that you can get all of the early-bird rewards, and don't miss out on limited quantities!

 

Credits:

Perks Photos and Designs Credit: Marie Taggart of ReeDesigns

Writers and Composers Credits

American Dream: Shane Barmby

Gone: Tony Ray Jones, John Swaim, and Tammy Vice

The Grass Ain't Always Greener: Matt Herren

My Life's A Country Song: Bobby Randall and Shane Barmby 

Vocals - Matt Herren 

Musicians and Backup vocalists all credited above in description

Co-producers: Tony Ray Jones and John Nicholson 

Sound Engineer: John Nicholson

Recorded at Hilltop Recording Studio, Nashville, TN

Preproduction at Backwoods Recording Studio, Nashville, TN
story_txt:
Operation: Bringing Back
TRUE Country Music!!!! 
                   
 
Please watch the video above!   
Hi!  My name is Matt Herren, and I am a neo-traditional country singer/songwriter on a mission to bring REAL country music back in style (and hopefully to the radio again)! 

Matt Herren at Hilltop Recording Studio in Nashville, TN. 
This is my first BIG, legit studio album that I have ever made!  I dreamed of making beautiful music that true country fans miss complete with: 

the steel guitar and fiddle 
songs with simple melodies and lyrics that speak to you
NO pop or rap beats - REAL drums only!!! 
Stories that everyday people can relate to - God, Country, Family, and Hard Times! 

 
So far, we have achieved that with my upcoming album titled American Dream.  You can hear some clips of the songs I have recorded already in the video up above and see some of the making of them in videos below.  I wrote or cowrote three of the songs on the album (The Grass Ain't Always Greener, What Country Is To Me, and The Love Of My Life).  
 
The remaining 7 songs were all carefully chosen from thousands of songs that were pitched to me from amazing songwriters in Nashville and all over the US- a few were grammy-award winning.  A couple are severely underrated songwriters and remarkable musicians.  I am honored to be able to cut their songs.   I've chosen each song on purpose because it spoke to me, and I felt it emotionally.  I think that's what REAL country music does for us.  
 


Recording American Dream (the title track song) 

 
Right now, I am working with my producer Tony Ray Jones and my wife and music manager, Heather Herren, on finalizing the arrangements for the second half of the album.  Tony is AMAZING at his job.  These songs are gonna knock your socks off!  It's gonna be killer!!!!!  (Well, hopefully it won't kill you - but more like entertain you.  Haha!)

Matt Herren and Producer Tony Ray Jones 
 
The lineup is as follows:

a sad, cheating ballad (I mean, what's more traditional country than that?)
a couple upbeat, blue collar living songs
a shaking your fist at the government song
a couple love ballads
a ballad about living with loss
a waltz about what true country music really is to me
an upbeat, mid-tempo song about living life to the fullest
an upbeat song about having fun with your significant other
a mid-tempo drinking song (can't leave that out of a REAL country album)

If you could reach into my head, pull out my thoughts about life, and turn them into songs - it would be this album.  
Tony helped me assemble the perfect band to bring these songs to life including Grammy-award winning, legendary guitarist, Brent Mason.  If you don't know who Brent Mason is, his most famous signature lick is the intro to Alan Jackson's Chatahoochee.  Man, can that guy play!  
 

Brent Mason, Tony Ray Jones, and Matt Herren 
I am also blessed to have Lonnie Wilson on drums.  He was the drummer in George Strait's Ace In The Hole Band.  Bruce Bouton played my favorite instrument - the steel guitar.  He played steel on all of Garth Brooks' records.  He's also a phenomenal songwriter and co-wrote a song on Brooks' "Ropin' The Wind" album.

Bruce Bouton on steel guitar and Matt Herren  
I've also been blessed with Joel Key on acoustic guitar, Duncan Mullins on bass, Aubrey Haynie on fiddle, and Johnny Brown on piano.  These guys are the A-team, and they are making this record sound PHENOMENAL!!!! 
 

The band working together on the arrangement for my original song
 "The Grass Ain't Always Greener"
 
In addition, I was fortunate enough to get award-winning vocalists, Chip and Billy Davis, as my backup singers.  They toured with Alabama as backup singers, and are grammy-award winning songwriters, as well.  
 

      Billy Davis, Chip Davis, Matt Herren, Heather Herren 
 
I am planning to market this album everywhere, and I expect GREAT BIG things to happen once it is released late this fall.  My goal is to start touring by the end of the year.  
 
Now, for the purpose in this campaign.  
I chose to be an independent artist so that a record label couldn't hijack my music, overproduce it with pop and rap beats, and turn it into something that I don't like.  I don't think fans of country music would like that either.  I think those of us who love country music miss when it ACTUALLY sounded country!  For me, it's ALL ABOUT THE ART!  As an independent artist, a label doesn't get to tell me what to do!!!!!!  
-Not that I am fully against labels.  If one offered me a record deal but didn't try to change me into pop or bro country, I'd be crazy to say no.  But I doubt that will happen in today's day and age of digital drumbeats and crossover genres forced on the radio.  
Since I am an independent artist without a label, I have to finance EVERYTHING!  I paid for the first half of the album out of pocket with my own hard-earned money.  But, as you can imagine, creating a radio-quality record with this A-team band ain't cheap!  My wife and I sold our second car and emptied our savings account to do the first half because this is MY American Dream.  

So I am asking you to partner with me on financing the remainder of the album.  YOU can collectively be my label!  In exchange, you will get rewarded with some AWESOME, EXCLUSIVE and LIMITED-EDITION perks that CANNOT be purchased at any other time.  Once this crowdfunding campaign is over, the opportunity to get these perks will be gone, too.   
 
 

How I Will Spend The Money
The goal that we have set is: $13,972.  That includes the following: 

Studio time at the legendary Hilltop Studios in Nashville, TN (infamous studio where legends like Dolly Parton, Alan Jackson, Merle Haggard, Waylon Jennings, Johnny Cash, Loretta Lynn and MORE have recorded back in their heydays!)  
Session musician pay
Producer and sound engineer fees
Travel to Nashville (we will have to stay for almost a week to finish the album).
Indiegogo payment processing fees
CD printing
Perks manufacturing and shipping
Songwriter splits / mechanical royalties
Graphics and photography 
Lunch for the band on recording day.  (This may not seem like a necessity, BUT short of doing something CRAZY like robbing a bank or dancing naked around a pole, I'll do whatever I have to do to get these A-lister band members to come back and play on my record. Haha!) According to EVERYONE who is ANYONE in Nashville, that's how it used to be done in the good old days before LA took over.  Since my mission is to bring old country back in style, why not treat the band the way they used to be treated when Nashville was still Nashville? These guys are legends, and they deserve to be treated as such.  So if a couple hundred dollars to cater lunch in is what makes them happy, then I am gonna make that happen if I can! 

 
If we happen to overfund (Lord, Jesus please let us overfund), I will put that money toward a publicist, album release party, digital marketing campaign, a tour manager, and a booking agent. What good will it do to have this PHENOMENAL REAL COUNTRY ALBUM if no one hears it???  My ultimate goal is to go on tour, promote this album, and meet some of my fans in person!  
 
 
 
How YOU are rewarded for your contribution.   
We have some AMAZING PERKS for you.   If you are on a mobile phone, you will see them scroll across the top. On a computer, they'll be on the right-hand side of the screen.  Some perks include: 

Physical CD with limited-edition 20+ page, custom insert including lyrics, photos from recording the album, and more!  It will also be autographed.  
Matt Herren 2022 Calendar. (I think this is weird because I wouldn't want a calendar with 12 of my photos in it.  But when I polled my fans, that's what they said they wanted.  So, we're gonna make it happen.  Haha!)
Autographed photo
Album T-shirt 
T-shirt/CD combo - save 12% when you bundle.  
One hour private video chat with me (and of course I'll serenade you, too!) for $99! 

 
 
    
 
Ultimate Fan Pack including  $415 worth of value for only $175 including the following:
Limited edition physical CD with custom insert (autographed and personalized) - can only get the personalization in the Ultimate Fan Pack
Limited Edition Album Cover T-Shirt
Personalized and autographed keychain (can only get the personalization and autograph in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
Limited edition, autographed photo
Signed photocopies of the original handwritten lyrics of the three songs that I wrote for this album.  My wife, Heather, who is the co-writer on two of the songs will also autograph the two that she collaborated with me on. (You can ONLY get the signed lyrics in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
Flash drive that will include behind-the-scenes photos, videos, and audio clippings of the making of this album.  (You can ONLY get the flash drive in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
Personalized thank you video from Matt (only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
Name listed on the website as an American Dream supporter
Name listed in the custom insert as a VIP supporter (only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
Limited Edition, signed album cover poster (only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
Limited Edition American Dream refillable ink pen (only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
FREE ticket to a virtual album launch concert on Facebook ($19.99 value - only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack
FREE ticket to the virtual VIP after-party on Zoom with Matt, Heather, and The Matt Pack ($65.00 Value only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
FREE ticket to a paid live Q&A with Momma Violet (Matt's Mom) and Momma Marie (Heather's Mom) - The Pack Momma's Tell All ($15.00 value - only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
Coupon for 20% off the entire cart  on mattherrenmusic.com (only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack)
Early access to the music - digital download code one week before everyone else - only offered in the Ultimate Fan Pack
FREE shipping included for US addresses 


 
One of our BIG WAMMY PERKS this time is LIFETIME floor seats at any concert for life with VIP Backstage passes for two people for only $1,000!  You heard me correctly!  LIFETIME SEATS!  GUARANTEED!  You also get the Ultimate Fan Pack perks, as well! These are limited in quantity - only 15 available.  But what a heck of a deal that is! 
 

 
My other BIG WAMMY PERK is a home/private concert for $10,000!  I will travel anywhere in the continental US and sing for any private event or put on a show just for you and your guests!  You also get the contents of the Ultimate Fan Pack included.  Limited in quantity.  ONLY 5 available! 
 
If you want to help but can't afford much, we have an opportunity for you to get your name on the website for ONLY $3!  
 
OTHER WAYS TO HELP

Subscribe to be a monthly supporter of Matt Herren Music for only $4.99 per month (on Facebook), and get a lot of cool behind-the-scenes videos and photos of the making of my music and me hanging out with my family and friends.  This is like Matt and Heather reality TV.  It's raw, real, and unedited footage of our daily lives.  You also get first access to new music that I write as well as special offers and discounts ONLY offered to monthly supporters.  
Re-contribute.  You can use the campaign to buy early Christmas presents for family and friends, donate a physical CD to a fan in need, or just plain donate some extra money to my campaign even after you have gotten the perks that you want.  You can re-contribute as much as you want without limit. 

 
Even if you can't afford to contribute money, there are some other ways that you can contribute and REALLY help!!!  

Please shout from the rooftop to all your friends and family who LOVE traditional country music !!!!  Share this campaign EVERYWHERE and OFTEN!  Tell everyone you know that I am trying my hardest to bring traditional country music back! 
Use the Indiegogo share tools!  
Pray for the campaign's success!  
Post a comment here on the campaign page and tell everyone what you HONESTLY think about my music.  I love feedback (good or bad), and I think other people love to hear honest feedback, as well.  
Every dollar, every comment, every share, and every prayer helps!

Shipping anywhere in the US is included in these perks prices, and we made it as affordable as we could for countries outside of the US.  We also had to build in profit to have the money to finish making the music.  So PLEASE keep that in mind when reviewing the prices.  We tried to keep everything as affordable as possible and build in as much value as possible.  However, at the end of the day, the point is to make a profit so we can make some GREET music!  So these perks are fundraiser-item priced. 
 
What Happens If I Don't Reach The Goal
If we don't reach this goal, we can't make this album quickly.  Plain and simple.  I am asking for the MINIMUM amount needed to finish off this album and fulfill these perks.  I can't cut any corners without sacrificing the quality of the music, so there is no way to do it any cheaper.  SO, if I don't make the goal, the money will be kept in our account until we can save or raise the remainder needed to complete the project and fulfill the perks.  I WILL finish recording this album.  When I am able to do it will depend on how much money I raise during this campaign.  (I don't want you skipping a rent payment or letting your dogs starve, but aside from that, your money is SO important and appreciated NOW more than I could ever describe in words.)  

 
TRUST
I know sometimes it's hard to trust people on crowdfunding sites - especially if it is someone you have no relationship with or have never met in person.  I get that. I want to reassure you that you WILL get your perks!  I may be just a simple, country boy from Arkansas with not much to my name, but the one thing I have is integrity.  My word is my bond.  If I tell you I am gonna do something, then I do it.  I can't promise much, but I can promise that you can trust me.  
AND, I can promise that you'll LOVE this album if you love REAL country music reminiscent of 90's style country like Alan Jackson and George Strait.   I live to make fans happy, and that is all I am trying to do here with the music and the perks.  
Just to ease your mind . . .Here are some quotes and pics from the first crowdfunding campaign that I did when I raised money for an EP.  (Mind you, this wasn't the same quality music as I am going to be putting out this time.  I didn't have a live band).  I didn't raise enough money to make music to the quality that I wanted to.  However, I promised that I would make a CD to the highest quality of music that I could with the money raised.  I set out to make my fans a CD because they were asking for it, and I delivered one as promised.  
 


 
Matt Pack Cares!
Here's one final incentive for you to partner with me on completing this album.  I love to give back, and my fans (The Matt Pack) do, too!  As a promise to my entire existing fan group (and any new fans I may acquire during this process), if we reach the entire funding goal, I will donate 150 digital download codes for the entire album to anyone who is currently or has formerly served in the military.  I believe we, as a society, owe them so much more, but this is what we can collectively do to thank them for their sacrifices.  
 

 
 
I will ALSO donate 150 codes to current cancer patients or their family members.  As a former cancer patient with childhood leukemia, I know the stress and toll that illness can take on a family. Music (especially: traditional country music) was the only escape that I had during those trying times.  If I can offer that same kind of escape and coping mechanism, then I am honored to be in a position to be able to do that.  

Matt Herren listening to country music at St. Jude Research Hospital in 1997. 
 

Matt Herren playing keyboard in the hospital bed at St. Jude.  Also pictured are two of the nurses who cared for him during his stay at the hospital. 
 
Finally, I want to thank everyone who has been following my journey and listening to my music, so far.  I owe every ounce of success that I have had to God, my supportive family,  my producer, Tony Ray, and especially my amazing fanbase, The Matt Pack!  Without all of ya'll, I wouldn't be where I am right now.  You have shown me that together, we can move mountains!  
 
So if you are as excited as I am about this new album, what are  you waiting for?  Contribute NOW.  Get your desired perks before they're all gone!  We have limited quantities on many of the items so that we can control the manufacturing costs.  Contribute early so that you can get all of the early-bird rewards, and don't miss out on limited quantities!
 
Credits:
Perks Photos and Designs Credit: Marie Taggart of ReeDesigns
Writers and Composers Credits
American Dream: Shane Barmby
Gone: Tony Ray Jones, John Swaim, and Tammy Vice
The Grass Ain't Always Greener: Matt Herren
My Life's A Country Song: Bobby Randall and Shane Barmby 
Vocals - Matt Herren 
Musicians and Backup vocalists all credited above in description
Co-producers: Tony Ray Jones and John Nicholson 
Sound Engineer: John Nicholson
Recorded at Hilltop Recording Studio, Nashville, TN
Preproduction at Backwoods Recording Studio, Nashville, TN

story:
The Bay Area Jazz Composers Book brings together musical works from 75 California Bay Area composers. A long overdue collection documenting one of the country’s most thriving jazz and improvised music scenes, the volume’s 124 compositions showcase a startlingly rich array of musical styles. Swing, hard bop, avant-garde, Brazilian, and free jazz comfortably co-exist—each piece an idiosyncratic voice within a multigenerational collective. Featuring a foreword from longtime Bay Area music journalist Andrew Gilbert alongside black-and-white photographs of the composers, this publication deserves a place on musicians’ shelves and bandstands.

Copies of the BAJCB will be donated to public school music programs, conservatories, and musicians in and with connections to the Bay Area. An invaluable teaching aid, the book will offer inspiration to aspiring musicians while fostering tangible connections among local students, teachers, and cultural workers. As music venues reopen their doors and live music returns, the book will serve as a resource to encourage collaboration between musicians in the Bay Area and beyond.

This publication is just one effort to recognize the vibrant, creative music scene born of the community.

We're asking for $5,500 to cover printing and shipping costs for 300 books and designer fees. Thank you for your generous support of Bay Area music.

story:
I Want to Make Records For You

My life revolves around music. Nothing brings me greater joy than hearing how music helped someone through a difficult time or provided some much needed relaxation. Four years ago I successfully completed my first crowdfunded campaign to release my debut album 'Headspace'. Now I'm asking for your help to press my latest album, 'I Am a Mountain', onto vinyl using the local record pressing plant right here in Vermont!

I've decided to press 100 copies onto colored vinyl that will be only available through this Indiegogo campaign. Once they're gone, they're gone. Each custom colored record will be hand-numbered and handled with the utmost care. I am hoping to sell every copy of these totally unique, custom colored records during this 30-day campaign. We can do it!

Photo by Luke Awtry Photography

 

A Collaboration with Standing Land

I am beyond excited to announce that this campaign is the start of an amazing collaboration with Standing Land, a hand-crafted, small batch tea shop that is owned and operated by my longtime friend Susan Staley. Sue has carefully crafted a unique tea blend to accompany this record that will be included with every vinyl contribution! I am very honored to have the opportunity to bring together tea and music in such a unique way and I am sure you all will enjoy sipping this delicious, grounding tea while enjoying your new vinyl record! Make sure to check out all Sue's other offerings including monthly tea subscriptions at standingland.com!

 

I Need Your Help and Here's Why!

Making records isn't cheap. I'm asking for your help to make this dream a reality. Here's a breakdown of every cost and the neat bonus stuff that we could do if we go over our goal! Let's do this!

Mastering and Lacquer Cutting - $850

You can't just toss anything onto vinyl. The audio must be specially prepared so it will translate perfectly onto wax. I use the best mastering engineer and spare no expense on this process.

Pressing Records at Burlington Record Plant - $1850

We're going local! I'm so excited to work with the local pressing plant here in Burlington, VT. They have been pumping out some great sounding records and I know they will do a great job. The records offered for this campaign will be the ONLY COLORED VINYL printed of this record and are limited to 100 copies. I know, crazy!

Custom Tea Blend from Standing Land - $300

Totally honored to be working in collaboration with Sue from Standing Land to create a special tea that pairs with this sonic journey. Each vinyl record will come with a few servings of this unique blend to be enjoyed while listening. We have really worked on getting the tea to match the journey. Grounding, earthy, harmonious.

Extra bonus, cool stuff! Splatter vinyl, custom inserts! - $???

I want it to be clear that EVERY PENNY received from this campaign is going into making the coolest, highest quality records possible. If there's extra money, it will be put into making the records even sweeter by doing things like adding custom inserts, photo booklets and beyond. The more money we raise, the cooler and more unique the records get. It's really how far you all want to take this project...

Concept vinyl album art 'I Am a Mountain'

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you're not a vinyl collector, you can still help me reach my goal! I deeply appreciate any contribution that you can make, if it's a few dollars or a few hundred. Every person who contributes I will personally thank in a recap video at the end of the campaign. And if you're not in the position to contribute monetarily, no worries, you can share this campaign with your friends and family on social media! That really helps me get the word out and will do wonders in making this successful.

I deeply appreciate each and every person who supports my musical journey. I wouldn't be here without you all. I'm eternally grateful to be able to pour my heart and soul into creating music that has a positive effect on the world. Thank you. 

In Love and Light,

Tom

story:
HEISK are: an innovative six piece contemporary trad band comprising of:

Catriona Hawksworth : keys

Lauren MacDonald : kit

Megan MacDonald : accordion

Rosie Munro : fiddle

Sally Simpson : fiddle

Becca Skeoch : harp

 

Our plan:

The album will be created, performed and engineered by women, it will highlight the talents of women in the creative industries. We will collaborate with female brass instrumentalists, producer, photographer, videographer, recording engineer and mastering engineer.

We're planning to record for seven days, with five days for mixing and mastering.

 

The project will involve:

3 brass musicians - tba

Producer - Anna Massie 

Artist - Elly Lucas 

PR - Hannah Innes

Recording engineer - tba

Mastering engineer - Katie Tavini

Printing - Birnam CD

 

The cost:

We need to make a mighty £5000 to make our album dream come true. This will go towards the recording, artwork, printing and a fabulous brass section.

£2000 - towards recording costs

£800 - Elly Lucas artwork - this will cover the photo shoot and album design

£1000 - album printing with Birnam - we will print 1000 physical copies of the album

£1200 - brass section - we want to invite some of our favourite brass musicians to come and play on a few of the tracks, and pay them a decent wage to do so

 

How you can help -

Please buy one of our perks!

If they are out of your price range, then please spread the word - share on your social media, websites, blogs, radio etc

We'd love your help!
